lom:description.lom:string:
Learn about engineering at Virginia State University. "The Mission of the School of Engineering, Science and Technology is to provide quality undergraduate and graduate education in engineering, engineering technology, mathematics, natural sciences, computer science, industrial technology and education; and to produce graduates who are well prepared to practice in their field of study and/or to pursue advanced education."
Keywords: HBCU, African American Engineers, Black Engineers.

lom:title.lom:string: Virginia State University: School of Engineering, Science, and Technology
